articles.title: Could this needle-free vaccine better protect us against new COVID variants? - Euronews
articles.description: Those with a phobia of needles could be in luck. This new vaccine could also better protect us against COVID mutations.
articles.content:
A new COVID-19 vaccine that can be administered without needles is being trialled at a university in the United Kingdom.
